duties_responsibilities.duty: Spearhead and encourage utilization of ProfitSword across division properties to automate reporting, forecasting, analysis, budgeting, and tracking.
Manage monthly financial statements by collecting and submitting them for all division hotels.
Assess bank reconciliations, confirm property revenue/balance sheet reconciliations, and oversee final approval of payroll accruals and Yardi/PMS totals.
Examine utility costs, review monthly accruals, ensure inventory/transfer of product processes are in place, and curate year-end administration at hotels.
Minimize manual processes by implementing automated reporting through Yardi/ProfitSword and creating and enforcing internal controls and standard policies.
Analyze capital project contracts, sign-off on monthly accruals, confirm filing of state sales/use/occupancy taxes, and collaborate with auditors on annual hotel appraisals.

Aid property GMs with forecasting/budgeting and ensure proper calculation/posting/paying of monthly management and franchise fees, as well as organizing frequent departmental meetings at each property.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or related field (Master's preferred)
